trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> to and from other data types.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"> </xref> til og fra andre datatyper.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormatConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormatConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the converter can convert an object of the given type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om konverteringen kan konvertere et objekt av den angitte typen til en forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Type context information used to evaluate conversion.
trans-unit.target: Skriv inn informasjon om sikkerhetskontekst som brukes til å evaluere konvertering.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Typen for datakilden som evalueres til konvertering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can convert the provided type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis konverteringen kan konvertere den angitte typen til en forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> can be converted to a different type.

trans-unit.source: The desired type to evaluate the conversion to.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can convert this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
